info.description: This is the [Scoold](https://scoold.com) RESTful API. You need to generate an [API key](/admin) from the 'Administration' page to access the API.
info.title: Scoold API

get.summary: General information and health

post.description:
To publish the post in the given space, set the `space` field. Otherwise the post will be created in the default space.
To change the author, set the `creatorid` field to an existing user.

get.summary: List questions on the front page

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: The `sortby` parameter could be a property name like `votes` or `properties.answercount` or a category like `activity`, `unanswered`, `unapproved` (posts without an approved answer)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The `filter` is used to filter results based on tags or location

parameters.name: favtags
parameters.description: Used in combination with the `favtags` filter parameter to filter posts based on a set of tags

parameters.name: latlng
parameters.description: Used in combination with the `local` filter parameter to filter posts based on location, for example `42.32,24.53`

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of when the post was created

creatorid.description: The `id` of the author of this post (an existing user)

latlng.description: Coordinates of the location in the format `"43.26,25.36"`

identifier.description: Can be in the format - `user@domain.com`, `fb:123456` (Facebook), `gp:google_id` (Google), `ldap:ldap_id` (LDAP), `oa2:oauth_id` (OAuth2), etc. Check the [Para docs]() for more details.

triggeredEvent.description: Passed in the body of a trigger `POST` request. Only used to trigger a custom event.

customPayload.description: Passed in the body of a trigger `POST` request. Only used to trigger a custom event with a custom payload.

limit.description: How many items to return at one time (default 30)
